NO ANSWER   9. INAPPLICABLE

Q.28A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT SERVING OVERSEAS AGAIN*    1. I WANT TO GET OVERSEAS AGAIN AS SOON AS POSSIBLE   2. I,M READY TO GO WHENEVER I,M NEEDED   3. I,D LIKE TO STAY IN THE U.S. FOR A FEW MONTHS, BUT THEN I,LL BE READY TO GO ANYWHERE   4. I DON,T WANT TO GO OVERSEAS AGAIN 9 5. CODE 1, 2 OR 3 CHECKED WITH 4, BUT A TYPE A COMMENT IS WRITTEN IN   6. NO ANSWER TO CHECK LIST BUT A TYPE A COMMENT IS WRITTEN IN 9 7. CODE 1, 2 OR 3 CHECKED WITH 4, BUT TYPE B COMMENT IS WRITTEN IN   8. NO ANSWER TO CHECK LIST BUT A TYPE B COMMENT IS WRITTEN IN   0. NO ANSWER   9. INAPPLICABLE

Q.28B. WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR YOUR ANSWER* E. TYPE A (CODES "1", "2", "3", "5" OR "6" CHECKED Q.28A):     . I WANT TO GET INTO THIS FIGHT; I,VE BEEN IN THE STATES LONG ENOUGH; I WANT TO SOLDIER (REPEATS CODE "1" CATEGORY Q.28A)    . I COULD BE OF MORE USE (TO THE ARMY) OVER THERE; WOULD HAVE BETTER CHANCE OF DOING MY SHARE OR WHAT I WAS TRAINED FOR AND HELP GET THE WAR OVER FASTER; I,M NOT DOING MUCH GOOD HERE    . WANT TO GET AWAY FROM ALL THIS GARRISON SOLDIERING; WANT TO GET AWAY FROM MY PRESENT OUTFIT; TOO G.I. HERE IN THE STATES; EVERYTHING IS SNAFUED HERE IN THE STATES; WOULD GET BETTER TREATMENT OVER THERE    . IT,S MY PATRIOTIC DUTY; BECAUSE I,M A SOLDIER; I,M READY TO SERVE WHEN AND WHERE THE ARMY NEEDS ME; AS LONG AS I,M IN THE ARMY, I SHOULD BE IN THE FIGHT OVER THERE WHERE THE ENEMY IS; I,LL DO WHAT I,M TOLD (REPEATS CODE "2" CATEGORY Q.28A)    . WILLING TO GO LATER - AFTER ZI SOLDIERS (U.S. COMMANDOS) HAVE GONE OVER; PLENTY AVAILABLE WHO HAVEN,T BEEN OVER YET    . WILLING TO GO LATER - BUT WANT MORE TIME IN THE STATES BECAUSE; - (ANY REASON EXCEPT CODE " " ABOVE) (E.G. - AFTER MORE TRAINING; AFTER HOME, FAMILY OR BUSINESS SITUATION IS CLEARED UP; HAVE GOTTEN MARRIED SINCE RETURNING TO U.S. AND DON,T WANT TO GO FOR A WHILE YET)    . WILLING TO GO BUT NOT ABLE TO GO BECAUSE; - (E.G. - NOT PHYSICALLY OR MENTALLY ABLE TO TAKE IT; CLASSIFIED AS PHYSICALLY DISQUALIFIED D.P.O., P.L.A., N.F.P.O.R.)    . WILLING (READY) TO GO - BUT WOULD RATHER NOT GO AT ALL; IF THE ARMY SAYS GO, YOU GO WHETHER YOU WANT TO OR NOT 5  . WILLING TO GO - IF I DON,T GO OVER, I,LL NEVER GET OUT OF THIS ARMY; ZI MEN HAVE LOW SCORE ON DEMOBILIZATION PLAN    . ANSWER IS OF TYPE, "I DON,T WANT TO GO OVERSEAS"    . ALL OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING MAN IS WILLING TO GO    . NO COMMENT WRITTEN IN    . NO ANSWER TO Q.28A OR Q.28B    . INAPPLICABLE (MEN WHO HAVE NOT SERVED OVERSEAS)    . INAPPLICABLE (ALL OTHER RESPONSES TO Q.28A) E. TYPE B (CODES "4", "7" OR "8" CHECKED Q.28A):

Q.28B. WHAT ARE THE REASONS FOR YOUR ANSWER* E. TYPE A (CODES "1", "2", "3", "5" OR "6" CHECKED Q.28A):     . HAVE DONE MY SHARE (NOT COMBINED WITH CODE " " BELOW); WAS OVER THERE LONG ENOUGH; FED UP WITH SOLDIERING; WANT TO STAY IN THE STATES; COULD DO MORE AS A WAR WORKER OR CIVILIAN (NO INDICATION OF WILLINGNESS TO GO AGAIN)    . AGGRESSION VS Z.I. SOLDIERS: THERE ARE PLENTY WHO HAVEN,T BEEN OVERSEAS; LET THEM HAVE SOME OF THE GLORY AND FIND OUT WHAT WE WENT THRU (IMPLIED OR STATED FEELING, "I,VE DONE MY SHARE, LET SOMEBODY ELSE DO IT"); NO INDICATION OF WILLINGNESS TO GO AGAIN    . PHYSICALLY UNFIT; TOO OLD; LIMITED SERVICE; DISQUALIFIED FOR OVERSEAS DUTY (D.P.O., P.L.A., N.F.P.O.R.)    . MENTALLY UNFIT; NERVOUSNESS; TROUBLE SLEEPING (STOMACH TROUBLE IS LIKELY TO BE MENTAL RATHER THAN PHYSICAL)    . WILLING TO GO LATER - AFTER Z.I. SOLDIERS (U.S. COMMANDOS) HAVE GONE OVER; PLENTY OF Z.I. AVAILABLE WHO HAVEN,T BEEN OVER YET    . COULDN,T TAKE IT; IT,S NO GOOD; TOO TOUGH; DANGEROUS; (NO MENTION OF CODES " ", " " OR " " ABOVE)    . HOME AND FAMILY REASONS    . BECAUSE I WANT OR EXPECT TO BE DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY (SOON); WILL BE AWAY TOO LONG IF I GO NOW; WILL BE STUCK IN ARMY OF OCCUPATION; IMPLIED OR STATED, "IF I WENT, I COULDN,T GET OUT OF THE ARMY AS SOON AS I WANT OR THINK I SHOULD"    . AGGRESSION VS ARMY, OFFICERS, CIVILIANS - BECAUSE OF THE WAY I,VE BEEN TREATED (E.G. - BECAUSE OF THE WAY I,VE BEEN TREATED SINCE RETURNING FROM OVERSEAS, BY THE ARMY, BY CIVILIANS)    . COMMENT IS INCONSISTENT WITH CHECK IN Q.28A; WILLING TO GO LATER BUT WANT MORE TIME IN THE STATES BECAUSE - (ANY REASON EXCEPT CODE " " ABOVE) E.G. - AFTER MORE TRAINING, AFTER HOME, FAMILY OR BUSINESS SITUATIONS ARE CLEARED UP    . ALL OTHER COMMENTS INDICATING MAN DOES NOT WANT TO GO OVERSEAS    . NO COMMENT WRITTEN IN    . NO ANSWER TO Q.28A OR Q.28B    . INAPPLICABLE (MEN WHO HAVE NOT SERVED OVERSEAS)    . INAPPLICABLE (ALL OTHER RESPONSES TO Q.28A)
